content: Other times, he can now raise his mace up to trigger a lightning storm all around the arena. These strikes will both track your position and also appear all over the arena, making it tough to evade them all unless you can stagger him out of it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellowbrow.md', within the main section titled 'Yellowbrow', specifically from the subsection 'Yellowbrow Boss Fight (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Other times, he can now raise his mace up to trigger a lightning storm all around the arena. These strikes will both track your position and also appear all over the arena, making it tough to evade them all unless you can stagger him out of it.
